quote: Landscape Architects Value your role, make a Positive difference & LEAD THE WAY. ENGAGE, COMMUNICATE & Have fun creating places
author: ARDH

quote: Landscape Architects are often natural leaders, able to communicate with many professions and leading multidisciplinary projects
author: IFLA Europe

quote: Don’t over-complicate DESIGN, often simple is best
author: ARDH

quote: Every great design begins with an even better story.
author: Lorinda Mamo

quote: You can’t use up creativity. The more you use the MORE you have.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: If you think good design is expensive, you should look at the cost of bad design.
author: Ralf Speth

quote: If I had asked people what they wanted, they would have said faster horses.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Leave it better than you found it.
author: Bruce A. Nordstrom
